justification: Asks Team B to give up its only healthy QB (dual-threat, a stated preference) while 0-8, leaving no starter—poor ToM. B prefers committee RBs, yet is offered a workhorse without acknowledging this mismatch. Rationale is generic and omits B’s urgency, roster constraints, and role trends. Though value may favor B, the trade is operationally unrealistic and minimally justified.
